Other Information: 4905524939316 Product Description: The Cyber-Shot DSC-TX30 from Sony is compact camera that's perfect for the outdoors. Its metal body resists the cold, is waterproof (up to 10 metres deep) and shockproof. With an 18 megapixel CMOS sensor, the TX30 has a built-in 26 mm wide angle lens and 5x optical zoom. This Sony compact offers sharp results thanks to its Steadyshot optical stabiliser and 128000 ISO. This device can also film 1080p Full HD videos. The Sony Cyber-Shot DSC-TX30 has 9 creative effects, a smile function and portrait function. Ready for anything, this versatile camera can also record panoramas and has a burst mode of ten images per second. Internal menu languages: English, French, German, Spanish, Italian, Portuguese, Dutch, Swedish, Norwegian, Danish, Finnish, Polish, Czech, Hungarian, Turkish, Greek, Bulgarian, Croatian, Romanian Publisher: Sony Dimensions: 1.5 x 96.4 x 5.9 centimetres (0.68 kg)
